Colour.name: Colour
Colour.description: This IPSO object should be used to report the measured value of a colour sensor in some colour space described by the units resource.

Colour.name: Colour
Colour.description: A string representing a value in some colour space.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
